message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient’s belief that the news anchor is referencing his life suggests a delusion of reference. Grandiose delusions involve beliefs of exaggerated self-importance and ability, bizarre persecutory delusions involve beliefs of being targeted by a specific individual or group, and delusion of inference involves a belief that behavior of other people is directed at the patient.
